Be more productive: don't be afraid to insist on Agenda setting befre accepting a meeting invitation. Go to as few bad meetings as possible.
be more productive: add to meeting calendars below agenda, a list of invitees with short notes to describe specifically why each are invited

simple, pragmatic and realistic one line tech strategy: "choose tech that supports the highest quality and fastest delivery as possible"
